scam-intro:
Thank you for contacting the staff team using our ticket system. We're sorry to hear that you have been scammed!

Please provide the following information:

- The scammer's Discord name (either their @ or UserID)
- The scammer's in-game link
- The scammer's in-game username
- Any chat logs with the scammer
- Screenshots or screen recordings proving you have been scammed
- Any information on the agreed trade
scammer: ### YOU ARE A SCAMMER, JUST STOP IT
sticker-rec:
Select hamburger menu in-game
Select Contact Support
Once you are in the chat bubble üí¨
Type: **I got scammed**
----------------------------
Then choose these options:

- **Choose your Platform**

- **More than 24 hours**

- **Missing Rewards & Items**

- **Album & Stickers**

- **Stickers for Rewards**

- **Explain [What Happened]**

- **Send the Evidence**
vgt-intro:
It looks like you have earned enough trading Rep to apply for the Verified GOLD Trader Role.

- We would like to see proof of 5 successful GOLDEN BLITZ trades./n- All Trades must be 4<:MG_Star:1151577541786738769> or 5<:MG_Star:1151577541786738769> trades sent by __you__.

We would appreciate your kind understanding to help us label your trades such as the following:

Traded with [Member] (Oh My Gems for Silhouette Night)

[insert your screenshots here]

Traded with [Member] (Footprints for Plunderful)

[insert your screenshots here]

See the [image](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/1148370897405743165/1183304532713812050/Verified_Trader_Help.jpg) below for reference.
vgt-void:
The verified GOLD trader requirement is at least 65 rep.

Unfortunately, you do not have enough reps to apply for this role. We encourage you to reapply for this role once you have fulfilled the requirements.

I will be closing this ticket now, thank you.
vt-void:
The verified trader requirement is at least 50 rep.

Unfortunately, you do not have enough reps to apply for this role. We encourage you to reapply for this role once you have fulfilled the requirements.

I will be closing this ticket now, thank you.
vt-intro:

- We would like to see proof of 30 successful trades./n- All Trades must be 4<:MG_Star:1151577541786738769> or 5<:MG_Star:1151577541786738769> trades sent by __you__.

1. **Traded with [Member]** (Twisted for Unwrapping)

[insert your screenshots here]

2. **Traded with [Member]** (Joyful Snow for Scottie's  Fort)

[insert your screenshots here]
vt-success:
We have gone through all your proof of trades and we can confirm that you have:

- :white_check_mark: At least 50 reps - (XX rep)

vgt-success:
We have gone through all your proof of trades and we can confirm that you have:

vt-close:
Congratulations, you are now a verified trader! <:MGT_VerifiedTrader:1180646943811182592>

Can you lastly confirm you have read and understood our <#1178281986268352582> & <#1175510897255526510> please :pray:

Please be advised that if any violations of these are found, there will be consequences & you‚Äôll risk losing your VTR :heart:
vgt-close:
Going forward, in order to retain your role, please acknowledge that you understand the rules as follows:

### :rotating_light: Important Rules to Follow:

* No excessive trade requests‚Äîstrictly 3 x 5-star stickers for 1 Gold (4/5 star).
* Gifting/Donating is highly encouraged.
* The party with the lower rep must send their entire end of the deal first (all stickers/stars).
* Both parties must share their links in DMs before trading.
* Clearly state your terms in your post‚Äîwhat you're offering and what you want.
* Auction-style posts are a no-go; keep it clean and straightforward.
* Selling stickers for real-world currency (crypto or fiat) is strictly prohibited.
* No hijacking other people's posts.

Please be also be advised that once verified as a **Trusted Gold Trader**, you will be under the scrutiny of Staff members to ensure that the **__role is not being misused__** in the <#1171829973825376346> as well as <#1175510897255526510>.

Any violations will result in your role being revoked under the discretion of Staff.

applestore: ## How to find recent purchases via IOS [below:](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/1175451636638941254/1183982764685541387/image.png?ex=658a50e0&is=6577dbe0&hm=ccf4a16481aebe8c7c352d04c42da9d5c5d2fa01aef6c3b6507ed7351b55148a&)
googleplay:
## How to find recent purchases via Android

- Look for an email receipt from: **googleplay-noreply@google.com**
- Receipt should be titled: **You've made a purchase from Scopely Inc on Google Play**
- Look for the following: **Order Number, Order Date, and Payment Method.**
contact:
**STEPS IN GETTING YOUR ACCOUNT BACK**

1. Open up the account you're trying to recover even if it's Level 0 
2. Click the Burger Menu on top right in-game :point_right:  ‚â°
3. Press **Customer Service**
4. Press **How can I contact Customer Support**
5. Press :speech_left: **Chat with us**
